scripts.coverage: npm run scripts/coverage.sh && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:sol:fix
scripts.dist: truffle-flattener ./contracts/YTHORewards.sol > YTHORewards.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize YTHORewards.full.sol && mv YTHORewards.bin YTHORewards.full.bin && mv YTHORewards_full_sol_YTHORewards.abi YTHORewards.full.abi && rm *_sol_*
scripts.dist-win: truffle-flattener ./contracts/YTHORewards.sol > YTHORewards.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize YTHORewards.full.sol && move YTHORewards_full_sol_YTHORewards.abi YTHORewards.full.abi && del *_sol_*
